div.span: Go to Afghanistan
Conduct a remote demonstration
Build armored suit
Build Jericho for terrorists
Announce end of weapons manufacturing
Secretly change direction
Synthesize the serum
Alert the international community
Destroy the serum formula
Patent the serum formula
Replicate and campaign
Negotiate with conglomerate
Synthesize plant compound
Negotiate with company

S: Tony Stark is a genius inventor and CEO of Stark Industries, a leading defense contractor.
G: To demonstrate the new 'Jericho' missile in Afghanistan and enhance the company's contribution to global defense.

Tony Stark decides to go to Afghanistan to demonstrate the Jericho missile.
Stark is critically wounded in an ambush and captured by the terrorist group the Ten Rings.
Stark learns his company's weapons are being used by terrorists.

Tony Stark decides to explore a hidden valley during a storm.
Tony discovers a rare flower with regenerative properties in the hidden valley.
Tony realizes a corporation is trying to exploit the valley's resources.

S: Tony Stark is captured and learns his weapons are misused by terrorists.
G: To escape captivity and stop his weapons from being used for terror.

Tony Stark decides to build an armored suit powered by a mini arc reactor.
Stark and Yinsen use missile components to build the suit and reactor.
Stark escapes by battling the terrorists and destroying their munitions.

Tony Stark decides to explore the rainforest for resources and help.
During his exploration, Tony discovers a rare plant with remarkable healing properties.
Tony is now aware of a ruthless pharmaceutical company trying to acquire the plant.

S: Tony Stark returns home, resolved to change his company's direction.
G: To redefine Stark Industries' mission away from weapon manufacturing.

Tony Stark decides to announce that Stark Industries will cease manufacturing weapons.
Stark builds an improved version of the armored suit and a more powerful arc reactor.
Stark confronts and defeats Stane, who was dealing weapons under the table and endangering lives.

Tony Stark decides to inject himself with an experimental serum that grants him superhuman abilities when his lab is attacked.
Using his newfound powers, Tony Stark fights off the attackers and vows to protect his research.
Tony Stark uses his invention to bring clean energy to the world, transforming the future of energy consumption.

S: Tony is aware of the corporation's intent.
G: To protect the valley and its discovery from exploitation.

Tony Stark decides to synthesize a serum from the flower.
Tony and an indigenous guide work together, using the rainforest's knowledge to create the serum.
They evade the corporation's mercenaries with their serum.

Tony Stark decides to explore ancient technologies for renewable energy solutions.
Tony discovers an ancient map leading to a city powered by an advanced renewable energy source, a crystal harnessing solar energy.
Tony learns of a tech conglomerate's plan to seize the crystal for profit.

S: Tony has synthesized the serum and faced the mercenaries.
G: To ensure the long-term protection of the valley and its secrets.

Tony Stark decides to destroy the serum formula.
Tony realizes the importance of keeping nature's secrets preserved.
Tony advocates for sustainable research and conservation of the Amazon.

Tony Stark decides to fund and lead an expedition to find a mythical tree capable of purifying water
Tony allies with a local conservationist familiar with the area and begins facing opposition from a corporation seeking to control water resources
After a challenging journey and overcoming both natural and man-made obstacles, Tony successfully locates the tree. He then embarks on a global campaign to protect it and utilize its purification properties sustainably
Tony Stark's efforts lead to a significant advancement in clean water access and conservation practices worldwide

S: Tony Stark knows about the crystal's power and the conglomerate's plan.
G: To protect the crystal and its technology from exploitation while promoting its use globally.

Tony Stark decides to replicate the crystal's technology and initiate a global green technology campaign.
Tony, with the help of allies, decrypts manuscripts on replicating the crystal's energy capabilities, and sets up decoys to mislead the conglomerate.
Tony successfully initiates a campaign promoting the integration of ancient wisdom with modern green technology.

Tony Stark decides to explore uncharted territories to find a natural purifier.
During his exploration in a remote forest, Tony stumbles upon a hidden cave system.
Inside the caves, Tony discovers a bioluminescent plant species capable of purifying air at an unprecedented rate.

S: Tony Stark learns about the pharmaceutical company's intentions for the rare plant.
G: To protect the plant and the indigenous people while sharing its properties ethically

Tony Stark decides to synthesize the plant's compound using portable lab equipment.
With the help of the indigenous community, Tony defends the plant from pharmaceutical mercenaries.
Tony manages to send the synthesized compound's data to a trusted colleague.

Tony Stark decides to lead an expedition to Antarctica.
During the expedition, Tony uncovers a prehistoric plant capable of purifying heavily polluted water.
Tony's discovery catches the attention of a powerful energy corporation wanting to exploit the plant.
